CustomField.formula: IF( ISPICKVAL( amc__Project__r.amc__Billing_Type__c , "Fixed Price") , IF(amc__Milestone_Budget__c > 0, amc__Milestone_Budget__c, (amc__Hours_Scheduled_Cost__c + amc__Material_Costs_Scheduled__c )) - (amc__Hours_Scheduled_Value_Cost__c + amc__Material_Costs_Scheduled__c), (amc__Hours_Scheduled_Cost__c + amc__Material_Costs_Scheduled__c) - (amc__Hours_Scheduled_Value_Cost__c + amc__Material_Costs_Scheduled__c))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Identifies the P&L for the Milestone based on the Scheduled figures. If Fixed Price, and Milestone Budget > 0, use Milestone Budget, otherwise use Hours Scheduled Billable Value. Otherwise if not Fixed Price, use Hours Scheduled Billable Value
CustomField.label: P&L (Scheduled)
